item.title: A Canonical Form for Max Plus Symmetric Matrices and Applications
item.description: arXiv:2410.12371v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: We develop a canonical form for congruence of max plus symmetric matrices. We use the same canonical form to get results in the generalized eigenvector problem. We have also utilized the canonical form to find all symmetric matrices that commute with a given symmetric matrix.
item.dc:creator: Himadri Mukherjee, Askar Ali M
